message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a great value considering its quality and features.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $11000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it brings.
